R

RandomlyChooser - Class in bkgft
This class chooses some statements randomly from a knowledge graph given as ttl file.
RandomlyChooser() - Constructor for class bkgft.RandomlyChooser
 
RDFRepoToTTLConverter - Class in bkgft
This class converts an RDF4J repository to a knowledge graph as file written in turtle format
RDFRepoToTTLConverter() - Constructor for class bkgft.RDFRepoToTTLConverter
 
readAll(Reader) - Static method in class bkgft.PropertiesQuerier
 
Reader - Class in bkgft
This class reads tables from wikipedia articles, preprocesses them and stores them as JSON strings in files.
Reader(String) - Constructor for class bkgft.Reader
Constructor sets the passed url.
RelationExtractor - Class in bkgft
This class takes a table and extracts relations from it.
RelationExtractor() - Constructor for class bkgft.RelationExtractor
 
repo - Static variable in class bkgft.GraphGenerator
 
repo_guard - Static variable in class bkgft.GraphGenerator
 
request(String) - Static method in class bkgft.PropertiesQuerier
This function gets a SPARQL query, sends it via HTTP to DBPedia and returns the results as JSON Object.
run() - Method in class bkgft.GraphGenerator
It reads the file, iterates over all the tables found in this file, generates possible relations and stores them in the repository.
run() - Method in class bkgft.Reader
It connects to wikipedia, fetches the article, preprocesses all of its tables and stores them as JSON (each table is a line) in a text file in the given folder.
